00511 inline uint16  
00512 OldStreetSegmentItem::getStreetNumber(bool left, bool start) const
00513 {
00514    if (left) {
00515       if (start)
00516          return m_leftsideNumberStart;
00517       else
00518          return m_leftsideNumberEnd;
00519    } else {
00520       if (start)
00521          return m_rightsideNumberStart;
00522       else
00523          return m_rightsideNumberEnd;
00524    }
00525 }
00526

00529 {
00530    return m_width;
00531 }
00532 
00533 inline bool 
00534 OldStreetSegmentItem::partOfStreet() const
00535 {
00536    bool retVal = false;
00537    uint32 myZoom = m_localID >> 27;
00538    for (uint32 i=0; i<getNbrGroups(); i++) {
00539       uint32 groupZoom = getGroup(i) >> 27;
00540       DEBUG4(cerr << "OldItem::partOfStreet() groupZoom = " 
00541                   << groupZoom << ", myZoom = " << myZoom << endl);
00542       if ( groupZoom < myZoom)
00543          retVal = true;
00544    }
00545    DEBUG4(
00546       if (retVal)
00547          cerr << "   OldItem::partOfStreet, returning TRUE" << endl;
00548       else
00549          cerr << "   OldItem::partOfStreet, returning FALSE" << endl;
00550    );
00551 
00552    return (retVal);
00553 }
